actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Davis-Bacon Act to provide that reports required under that act be public information, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that contract reports on the rate of wages for laborers and mechanics, as required under the Davis-Bacon Act, be public information. (Amends 40 U.S.C. 276(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Davis-Bacon Act to provide that reports required under that act be public information, and for other purposes.
